title: [Yegharren Valley, Trail]
description: The trail slopes steeply down to the east, descending into a lush, wooded valley.  Bright green fireflies flicker among the ferns that line the shaded path.  Far to the east, a vast moonlit expanse of tree-dotted grassland and distant mist-shrouded moors can be glimpsed through the branches.

The trail slopes steeply down to the east, descending into a lush, wooded valley.  Bright yellow butterflies flitter among the ferns that line the shaded path.  Far to the east, a vast expanse of tree-dotted grassland and distant mist-shrouded moors can be glimpsed through the branches.
